definitions.definition: Something known or assumed as fact , and is made the basis of reasoning or inference which an intellectual system of any sort (such as knowledge or theoretical framework ) is constructed.
examples: given this datum it follows that

definitions.definition: Singular of data : A single recorded material , especially obtained by scientific work.
A point , line , or surface with reference to which positions (such as elevations ) are measured or indicated (such as a permanent benchmark in leveling or mean sea level in a topographical survey ).
examples: A geodetic datum is sometimes also called a benchmark.

definitions.definition: A floating reference point , or SLDMB , used to evaluate surface currents in a body of water , and often employed by coastal search and rescue.

main_definition: Something known or assumed as fact , and is made the basis of reasoning or inference which an intellectual system of any sort (such as knowledge or theoretical framework ) is constructed.
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) Singular of data : A single recorded material , especially obtained by scientific work.

( cartography , surveying ) A point , line , or surface with reference to which positions (such as elevations ) are measured or indicated (such as a permanent benchmark in leveling or mean sea level in a topographical survey ).
( nautical ) A floating reference point , or SLDMB , used to evaluate surface currents in a body of water , and often employed by coastal search and rescue.
